name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Oekaki Puzzle 2
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

"Oekaki Puzzle 2" (Nonogram) is a popular illustration logic puzzle in magazines. Try your hands on all the 200 addictive puzzles when you have a little time.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
